name: Core Banking System Modernization
description: Replace legacy mainframe banking system with modern cloud-based architecture

inputs.projectVision: Modern cloud-native core banking system to replace 40-year-old mainframe. Support retail banking operations including accounts, transactions, loans, deposits, and regulatory reporting. Must handle 10M+ customers and 100M+ daily transactions with zero data loss.

predefinedRisks.description: Resistance to change from mainframe-trained staff
Integration with hundreds of existing systems

keyDeliverables: Business case with TCO analysis vs mainframe
Initial use case model from legacy system analysis
Comprehensive risk assessment for banking transformation
Data migration architecture and ETL design
Detailed use cases for core banking workflows
Iteration 1-2: Account management and customer data
Data migration tools and batch processes

rationale: Banking system modernization is perfect for RUP. Two Inception iterations handle complex stakeholder analysis. Three Elaboration iterations address high technical risks (data migration, transaction processing, compliance). Eight Construction iterations enable phased implementation of banking domains. Three Transition iterations manage complex cutover and training.
